name: Space Trap (Vedant Dulori)
description:
Space Trap is a NBSS Initiative by Dulori Production

Space Trap is one of the most fascinating game you would love to play.The game is specially made for the special need children who are lacking behind in their hand motor skills and IQ. Hence, the motive of the game is to enhance their hand motor skills and IQ.

How to Play?

Arrow up: Move up

Arrow down: Move down

Arrow left: Move backward

Arrow right: Move forward

Mouse right click: To shoot

Press 'R' button: To Restart Game

Press 'P' button: To Pause Game

Press 'Esc' button: To quit game

Credits:
